name: Soulbound Steel
description:
Your bullets are Undead Soldiers
Soulbound Steel is an action game that merges hack n’ slash and shooter into a single mechanic. Summon your warriors and let them slash away forward, decimating anyone in their path. Then, lead them around to block enemy attacks, from sword swings to meteors.

Dominate the World of the Living
Conquer colossal castles and reign over them. Face celestial giants, armored fighters, enraged beasts and divine sorcerers. Talk to the dead in your conquered domains to gain new information and expand your kingdom even further.

Summon Powerful Demons
Claim perished souls and call for long-forgotten entities to bring calamity to the battlefield with their abilities.
